name: Escape The Admin
description:
Made for the Realms Of Sabrim Media Contest

Discord: https://discord.gg/fa3daZz5Hn

You have just been caught x-raying on your favourite Minecraft server, run from the grasp of the Admin but be aware, he may duplicate or appear out of no where! Make sure to have fun in this arcade like game! Made by coayuna. 

Controls:

Use the arrow keys to move around

Use the C key to reset

Use the X key to start
